Module com.simulator.hospital
Package com.simulator.hospital.model.logic

Class ServicePoint

java.lang.Object
com.simulator.hospital.model.logic.ServicePoint
public class ServicePoint extends Object
Represents a service point in the hospital simulation. Tracks the status of the service point, the customer being served, service statistics, and location coordinates.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ServicePoint()
    Constructs a new service point with a unique ID.

  • Constructor Details

    • ServicePoint

      public ServicePoint()
      Constructs a new service point with a unique ID. Initializes service statistics to zero.

  • Method Details

    • isAvailable

      public boolean isAvailable()
      Checks if the service point is available to serve a new customer.
      Returns:
      true if the service point is available, false otherwise.

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Gets the unique ID of the service point.
      Returns:
      the service point ID.

    • getCurrentCustomer

      public Customer getCurrentCustomer()
      Gets the current customer being served at this service point.
      Returns:
      the current customer, or null if none.

    • setCurrentCustomer

      public void setCurrentCustomer(Customer currentCustomer)
      Sets the current customer being served at this service point.
      Parameters:
      currentCustomer - the customer to set.

    • addServiceTime

      public void addServiceTime(double serviceTime)
      Adds service time for a customer to the total service time.
      Parameters:
      serviceTime - the service time to add.

    • getTotalServiceTime

      public double getTotalServiceTime()
      Gets the total service time for all customers at this service point.
      Returns:
      the total service time.

    • addCustomer

      public void addCustomer()
      Increments the total number of customers served by this service point.

    • getTotalCustomer

      public int getTotalCustomer()
      Gets the total number of customers served by this service point.
      Returns:
      the total number of customers.

    • getMeanServiceTime

      public double getMeanServiceTime()
      Calculates and returns the mean service time for this service point.
      Returns:
      the mean service time.

    • getUtilization

      public double getUtilization()
      Gets the utilization percentage of this service point.
      Returns:
      the utilization percentage.

    • setUtilization

      public void setUtilization(double utilization)
      Sets the utilization percentage of this service point.
      Parameters:
      utilization - the utilization percentage to set.

    • getX

      public int getX()
      Gets the x-coordinate of the service point in the simulation space.
      Returns:
      the x-coordinate.

    • getY

      public int getY()
      Gets the y-coordinate of the service point in the simulation space.
      Returns:
      the y-coordinate.

      Sets the x-coordinate of the service point in the simulation space.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate to set.

    • setY

      public void setY(int y)
      Sets the y-coordinate of the service point in the simulation space.
      Parameters:
      y - the y-coordinate to set.

    • resetCount

      public static void resetCount()
      Resets the static counter for service point IDs to 1. Useful when starting a new simulation.
